title: 십센치 - 선재 업고 튀어 OST '봄 눈 / Spring Snow'
lyrics: garyeojin oraen sigani urireul dasi bulleowa eoneu gose isseodo geu kkeuteun hangsang neoingeol Cause I’m falling slowly love with you oraetdongan gidaryeoon neoneun bomiya Cause I’m falling slowly love with you da si jiwojinda haedo All my life is you neoraneun iyagi soge dasi tto kkumeul kkun eun na eotteon sungani wado nan neoreul chaja galgeoya Cause I’m falling slowly love with you oraetdongan gidaryeoon neoneun bomiya Cause I’m falling slowly love with you da si jiwojinda haedo All my life is you kkotnip nallideon hayag irwie haengbo khaetdeon neowa na dasi mannal su itdamyeon Cause I’m falling slowly love with you oraetdongan gidaryeoon neoneun bomiya Cause I’m falling slowly love with you da si jiwojinda haedo All my life is you
